cast.name: 理查·克莱因 Richard H. Kline

writer.name: 罗伯特·费希尔 Robert Fischer

director.name: 罗伯特·费希尔 Robert Fischer

this_title: Blood on the Lens: Richard H. Kline on Brian De Palma's 'The Fury'
introduction: in this video interview, cinematographer Richard H. Kline (King Kong, The Boston Strangler) recalls his one and only collaboration with Brian De Palma on The Fury. The interview was directed, produced, and edited by Robert Fischer for Fiction Factory.
chinese_title: Blood on the Lens: Richard H. Kline on Brian De Palma's 'The Fury'
